card.title: Sprint 1
card.description: Inception & Elaboration

card.title: Kick-off meeting
card.description: A high-level requirement walkthrough to understand the scope of the initiative. (BA & Business)

comment.message: Business wanted to have an indoor navigation app to locate people and do route planning. High-level features should include: 1. Users be able to see all people in the building from the app. 2. The app can do route planning, such as route of shortest distance / time and show these information on the map.

card.title: High-level requirement walkthrough
card.description: A high-level requirement walkthrough with developers to arrive a high-level estimate for dev and release time and cost. (BA, business and tech lead)

comment.message: If we want to locate people and do route planning, it would take at least half a year because of the limit of resource. As the business wanted the first release in October, they decided to have the 'locate people' feature first.

checkListItem.content: Do second research to see what public domain has in the field of indoor navigation.

comment.message: Main story list: 1. As an administrator, I want a login page, so that I can access my account. 2. As an administrator, I want to be able to create users so that I can add people that are not in the database. 3. As an administrator, I want to be able to create buildings so that I can add buildings that are not in the database. 4. As an administrator, I want to be able to create lots so that I can add lots that are not in the database. 5. As an administrator, I want to be able to attach chips to people, so that I can locate them. 6. As an administrator, I want to be able to attach beacons to lots, so that I can track people. 6. As a user, I want to be able to see where people are so that I can find them. 7. As a user, I want to be able to see how many people there are in a room, so that I have the basic knowledge of the room. 8. As a user, I wan to be able to create map for my own room so that it is accurate. 9. As a user, I want to be able to see whether there are active beacons around so that I can know whether I'm locatable.
Include BA, design, dev, test and project management, the time estimate was about 2 months. Present to the business with +/-60% contingency to review.

card.title: Commitment
card.description: Let business review and if they are happy to go, we move on to elaboration phase.

comment.message: Business was happy to commit the initiative.

card.title: Confirm main story list
card.description: Confirm the in-scope items, priorities and Must Have / Should Have / Could Have. (BA & Business)

comment.message: Business was happy with the main story list

card.title: Design workshops
card.description: Understand the requirements from UX standpoint. (BA, business and UX designer)

card.title: Create Mock-ups
card.description: Create mock-ups

card.title: Design testing
card.description: Test the design. (UX designer, Business)

card.title: User story breakdown
card.description: Break down high-level epics into low-level user stories. (BA)

card.title: Technical / Solution design
card.description: Create technical design based on user stories. (BA, dev, test

card.title: Product Backlog Refinement
card.description: 'What' and 'Why' of the stories are understood. Technical solutions for walked through are defined. (BA, Business)

card.title: Estimation
card.description: Stories are estimated with points. Stories ave sub tasks with estimation.

card.title: Sprint Planning
card.description: Select stories to be proceeded for this sprint based on priorities.

card.title: User Stories Dev
card.description: Coding is complete and in source control (GIT).

card.title: Create user and display user details (without location for now)
As a user, I want a login page so that I can see my account.
As a user, I want to see my friends' locations and their details.
As a user, I want to be able to create users, so that I can add them in my friend list.
As a user, I want the login page to display my name on the screen, so that I can go into my account without specifying credentials.
As a user, I want a friend list screen so that I can choose someone to see details.
As a user, I want to see my friend's details, including their current location and the map so tha...
card.description: As a user, I want to see my friend's details, including their current location and the map so that I can locate them.

card.title: As a user, I want to be able to create users, including firstname, surname, username, password, s...
card.description: As a user, I want to be able to create users, including firstname, surname, username, password, so that I can add them to the database.

card.title: As a user, I want to attach chip to a new friend, so that s/he is tractable.
Desk Check
card.description: Dev / testers provide a walk through of the implementation with the business. Feedback is gathered.

card.title: Product Backlog Refinement
card.description: 'What' and 'Why' of the stories are understood. Technical solutions for walked through are defined. (BA, Business)

card.title: Estimation
card.description: Stories are estimated with points. Stories ave sub tasks with estimation.

card.description: Select stories to be proceeded for this sprint based on priorities.

card.description: Coding is complete and in source control (GIT).

card.title: Show a screen of tracking status.
See user details with actual location.
As a user, I want to see a screen to see whether there are active beacons around me, so that I kn...
card.description: As a user, I want to see a screen to see whether there are active beacons around me, so that I know whether I'm tractable.

card.title: As a user, I want to see my friend's location in the map.
As a user, I want to be able to create buildings and lots, so that they are stored in the database.
As a user, I want to see a screen to see whether there are active beacons around me and the statu...
card.description: As a user, I want to see a screen to see whether there are active beacons around me and the status detail (active or not), so that I know whether I'm tractable.

card.title: As a user, I want to be able to see my friend's location on the map so that I know where exactly ...
card.description: As a user, I want to be able to see my friend's location on the map so that I know where exactly s/he is in the room.

card.title: As a user, I want to be able to create buildings, include name, address details (unit, street, st...
card.description: As a user, I want to be able to create buildings, include name, address details (unit, street, street no, suburb, city, state, postcode), so that this building is stored in the database.

card.title: As a user, I want to be able to create lots in the building, including lot type, level, name and ...
card.description: As a user, I want to be able to create lots in the building, including lot type, level, name and lot shape (width, height, length in metres), so that I can add lot to the database.

card.title: Desk check
card.description: Dev / testers provide a walk through of the implementation with the business. Feedback is gathered.

comment.message: Business was happy with the implementation.

card.title: As a user, I want to see how many people there are in the room so that I know the room details.

card.description: As a user, I want the map to show all people's locations in the room so that I know the exact locations.

card.title: As a user, I want to be able to attach beacons to lots so that I can make the room tractable.
Final Review
card.description: Final review before closing the project. (Business)
